row.process:
:SET &DECRYPT_COMMAND# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar" ARB -cmd cipher decrypt "&UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#"'
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=((&DECRYPT_COMMAND# | findstr.exe /B Decrypted:).substring(11)).Trim() :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE for /F "tokens=1 delims=" %%a IN ('&DECRYPT_COMMAND# direct') DO ( set UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=%%a ) :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=`&DECRYPT_COMMAND# | grep "^Decrypted: " | sed 's/^Decrypted: //'` :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF
